nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.settings

Interface SettingsService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SettingsServiceLocal
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SettingsServiceImpl, SettingsServiceSecurity

    public interface SettingsService
extends Service
    Service interface for application settings handling
    Author:
    luis

        java.lang.String exportToXml(java.util.Collection<Setting.Type> types)

        Parameters:
        types - types of settings to be exported

      • importFromXml

        java.util.List<?> importFromXml(java.lang.String xml,
                              java.util.Collection<Setting.Type> types)
        Import settings from the given xml string. The expected format is: 
         <cyclos-settings>
     <settings type="...">
         <setting name="...">
             value
         </setting>
         <setting name="...">
             value
         </setting>
     </settings;>
     <settings type="...">
         <setting name="...">
             value
         </setting>
         <setting name="...">
             value
         </setting>
         <setting name="...">
             value
         </setting>
     </settings;>
 </cyclos-settings>
        Parameters:
        types - type of settings to import
